derivation: to show blood (in the face), i.e.
outline:
1. to be red, red
    1. (Qal) ruddy (of Nazarites)
    2. (Pual)
      1. to be rubbed red
      2. dyed red
      3. reddened
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to show red
      2. to glare
      3. to emit (show) redness
    4. (Hithpael)
      1. to redden
      2. to grow red
      3. to look red
